Package main.controller.camp

Class CampManager

java.lang.Object
main.controller.camp.CampManager
public class CampManager extends Object
Manages camps and provides functionalities for camp creation, updating, retrieval, attendee registration, withdrawal, and loading from CSV resources.

    • getStudentcamps

      public static Map<Camp,String> getStudentcamps(Student student)
      Retrieves the camps associated with a student and their roles (Committee or Attendee).
      Parameters:
      student - the student for whom to retrieve camps.
      Returns:
      a map of camps and their associated roles, or null if no camps are associated.
